title: Human trafficking is all around you. This is how it works
description: Behind the everyday bargains we all love -- the $10 manicure, the unlimited shrimp buffet -- is a hidden world of forced labor to keep those prices at rock bottom. Noy Thrupkaew investigates human trafficking – which flourishes in the US and Europe, as well as developing countries – and shows us the human faces behind the exploited labor that feeds global consumers.
author: Noy Thrupkaew
keywords: TED, talks, Slavery, consumerism, crime, economics, work
